mapper.select: SELECT GUID, CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, CODETYPE, SHOWTYPE, CODENAME, ISCLASSIFICATION, BASETABLENAME FROM MA_CODE_MASTER
SELECT GUID, CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, CODETYPE, SHOWTYPE, CODENAME, ISCLASSIFICATION, BASETABLENAME FROM MA_CODE_MASTER WHERE GUID = #GUID#

SELECT GUID, CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, CODETYPE, SHOWTYPE, CODENAME, ISCLASSIFICATION, BASETABLENAME FROM MA_CODE_MASTER
AND CODENAME = #CODENAME#
AND ISCLASSIFICATION = #ISCLASSIFICATION#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MA_CODE_MASTER ( GUID, CODENAME, TITLE, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, DESCRIPTION, SHOWTYPE, CODETYPE, ISCLASSIFICATION, BASETABLENAME ) VALUES ( #GUID#, #CODENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TITLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SHOWTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CODETYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISCLASSIFICATION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #BASETABLENAME:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MA_CODE_MASTER
UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# title=#TITLE#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, description=#DESCRIPTION#, CODETYPE=#CODETYPE#, showtype=#SHOWTYPE#, ISCLASSIFICATION=#ISCLASSIFICATION#, BASETABLENAME=#BASETABLENAME#,
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
